DescribeApmAgent.document: 获取 APM 接入点示例
DescribeApmAgent.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeApmAgent
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "jYm6_leMg"
}
DescribeApmAgent.title: 获取 APM 接入点

DescribeApmInstances.title: 获取 APM 业务系统列表

DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig.document: 查询指定业务系统下应用的配置信息
DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "apm-6xYKFXYxo",
    "ServiceName": "java-order-service"
}
DescribeGeneralApmApplicationConfig.title: 查询应用配置信息

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document: 该示例查询业务系统为 apm-059oXBfTL，按照 service.name（应用名）、span.kind（客户端/服务端视角）为维度过滤，以 service.name（应用名）、span.kind（客户端/服务端视角）进行聚合，查找开始时间-终止时间内以一分钟为聚合粒度的 request_count（请求数量）、error_request_count（错误请求数量）、duration_avg（平均响应时间）、slow_request_count（慢请求数量）、duration_p50（耗时 p50）的指标数据。
DescribeGeneralMetricData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralMetricData
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "service.name",
            "Value": "ot-java-order-service"
        },
        {
            "Key": "span.kind",
            "Value": "client"
        }
    ],
    "ViewName": "service_metric",
    "InstanceId": "apm-059oXBfTL",
    "Period": 60,
    "Metrics": [
        "request_count",
        "error_request_count",
        "duration_avg",
        "slow_request_count",
        "duration_p50"
    ],
    "StartTime": 1734415200,
    "EndTime": 1734418800,
    "GroupBy": [
        "service.name",
        "span.kind"
    ]
}
DescribeGeneralMetricData.title: 查询1分钟聚合粒度的 service_metric 指标数据示例

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document: 该示例查询业务系统为 apm-059oXBfTL，按照 service.name（应用名）、span.kind（客户端/服务端视角）为维度过滤，以 service.name（应用名）、span.kind（客户端/服务端视角）进行聚合，查找开始时间-终止时间内以一分钟为聚合粒度的 request_count（请求数量）、error_request_count（错误请求数量）、duration_avg（平均响应时间）、slow_request_count（慢请求数量）、duration_p50（耗时 p50）的指标数据。
DescribeGeneralMetricData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralMetricData
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "service.name",
            "Value": "ot-java-order-service"
        },
        {
            "Key": "span.kind",
            "Value": "client"
        }
    ],
    "ViewName": "service_metric",
    "InstanceId": "apm-059oXBfTL",
    "Metrics": [
        "request_count",
        "error_request_count",
        "duration_avg",
        "slow_request_count",
        "duration_p50"
    ],
    "StartTime": 1734415200,
    "EndTime": 1734418800,
    "GroupBy": [
        "service.name",
        "span.kind"
    ]
}
DescribeGeneralMetricData.title: 查询起始到终止时间内统计 service_metric 指标数据示例

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document: 该示例查询业务系统为 apm-059oXBfTL，按照 service.name（应用名）为维度过滤，以 service.name（应用名）进行聚合，查找开始时间-终止时间内以一分钟为聚合粒度的 error_request_count（错误请求数量）、duration_avg（平均响应时间）的指标数据。
DescribeGeneralMetricData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralMetricData
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "service.name",
            "Value": "ot-java-order-service"
        }
    ],
    "ViewName": "sql_metric",
    "InstanceId": "apm-059oXBfTL",
    "Period": 60,
    "Metrics": [
        "error_request_count",
        "duration_avg"
    ],
    "StartTime": 1734415200,
    "EndTime": 1734418800,
    "GroupBy": [
        "service.name"
    ]
}
DescribeGeneralMetricData.title: 查询1分钟聚合粒度的 sql_metric 指标数据示例

DescribeGeneralMetricData.document: 该示例查询业务系统为apm-059oXBfTL，按照 db.instance（数据库名称）为维度过滤，以 service.name（应用名）、db.statement（执行语句）为维度进行聚合，查找开始时间-终止时间内 top5 的 duration_avg（耗时（ms））的指标数据。
DescribeGeneralMetricData.title: 查询起始到终止时间内统计 sql_metric 的 duration_avg（耗时时间）指标数据示例

DescribeGeneralOTSpanList.document: 通用查询 OpenTelemetry 调用链列表
DescribeGeneralOTSpanList.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralOTSpanList
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "apm-CVfliqa8U",
    "StartTime": 1739864668,
    "EndTime": 1739865268,
    "Limit": 10
}
DescribeGeneralOTSpanList.title: 通用查询 OpenTelemetry 调用链列表

DescribeGeneralSpanList.document: 根据 Trace ID 列表批量查询 Span，Filters 查询参数中将 Type 设置为 in ，将 Trace ID 列表通过,隔开
DescribeGeneralSpanList.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralSpanList
<公共请求参数>

{
    "OrderBy": {
        "Value": "startTime",
        "Key": "desc"
    },
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "traceID",
            "Type": "in",
            "Value": "663727c6d5d4436dd1fcaa509d0f4dc0,6c2c8ebff420a8e5b2276ec799446f98,68d3062a4c559ba212a36f61c97ba8ac"
        }
    ],
    "Limit": 0,
    "Offset": 10,
    "InstanceId": "apm-52Dpv13GR",
    "StartTime": 1742374000,
    "EndTime": 1742374331,
    "BusinessName": "tdmq"
}
DescribeGeneralSpanList.title: 通用查询调用链列表

DescribeGeneralSpanList.document: 指定 Tag 过滤条件拿到 Span 列表
DescribeGeneralSpanList.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeGeneralSpanList
<公共请求参数>

{
    "OrderBy": {
        "Value": "startTime",
        "Key": "desce"
    },
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "pulsar:sub_name",
            "Type": "=",
            "Value": "participants"
        }
    ],
    "Limit": 0,
    "Offset": 10,
    "InstanceId": "52Dpv13GR",
    "BusinessName": "tdmq",
    "StartTime": 1621923035,
    "EndTime": 1621923038
}
DescribeGeneralSpanList.title: 通用查询调用链列表2

DescribeMetricRecords.title: 请求参数示例
通用指标列表接口

DescribeServiceOverview.title: 获取应用概览数据

DescribeTagValues.document: 根据维度列名和过滤条件，查询维度值
DescribeTagValues.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeTagValues
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Filters": [
        {
            "Key": "service.instance",
            "Type": "=",
            "Value": "127.0.0.1"
        }
    ],
    "TagKey": "servier.name",
    "InstanceId": "apm-CVfliqa8U",
    "StartTime": 1742374000,
    "EndTime": 1742374331
}
DescribeTagValues.title: 查询维度数据

ModifyApmInstance.document: 修改 APM 业务系统参数
ModifyApmInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: apm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyApmInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "apm-CVfliqa8U",
    "Tags": [],
    "Description": "测试业务系统",
    "TraceDuration": 0,
    "Name": "测试业务系统",
    "OpenBilling": true,
    "SpanDailyCounters": 1,
    "ErrRateThreshold": 5,
    "SampleRate": 50,
    "ErrorSample": 1,
    "SlowRequestSavedThreshold": 500,
    "IsRelatedLog": 0,
    "LogRegion": "",
    "LogTopicID": "",
    "LogSet": "",
    "LogSource": ""
}
ModifyApmInstance.title: 成功事例
